title: A wonderful oasis on the lower tip of Manhattan
text: If you want top notch service in NYC, then this hotel is the place for you. Battery Park is very special; the World Trade Center, Jewish Museum, ferries to Ellis Island, the Statue of Liberty and Staten Island are all within steps of this spectacular hotel. And, the views of the harbor and Lady Liberty are unparalleled. I would go back in a second if I had the time.
